job.title: Data Scientist - Customer Care (Austin, TX)
job.description: We are looking for the right people to join our wellfunded growing open source startup and to help us to continue to build exciting technology that make our users happy Right now we are looking for a Data Scientist to join our team in Austin TXbrbrWho are youbrbrYou have a background in applied data science and enjoy the process of both developing models and putting them into production to gain insights from complex data sets You are a wizard with blending data from varied sources and bringing to bear cuttingedge algorithms and techniques on that data  but most importantly you are able to tell the story of your data analysis to others with a less technical background than your own Above all you enjoy meeting the challenge of helping teammates solve their analytics problemsbrbrWhats the jobbrbrIn this position you will support the customer care team by providing your data science expertise with a focus on encouraging adoption of both KNIME Analytics Platform and KNIME Server among prospects You will help develop proofofconcept solutions for these prospects and contribute to software demonstrations for relevant audiences via calls webinars and presentations You will also test newly developed software features and provide input from the perspective of a data scientist enduser to the development team This is a public facing role which requires a friendly and helpful attitude towards users customers and coworkers as well as fluency in English If you have some experience with KNIME software already thats great  but if you dont well help you learnbrbrWho are webrbrWe are a rapidly growing young company developing software for performing advanced data science We are a highly interactive team and very enthusiastic about developing solutions for our users Our open source KNIME Analytics Platform developed together with the community is transforming the data science landscape It is popular among its very active user community as well as among IT analysts Our commercial KNIME Server enables enterprises to responsibly integrate advanced analytics into their operations In this way KNIME helps organizations nurture new user populations that want to exploit the benefits of data science and advanced analytics while remaining strongly committed to open sourcebrulliThough we are happy to have applicants from further away were not offering relocation benefits for this positionliul
